languages.text: At the start of each round, if veil degradation is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} warp damage.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each round, if veil degradation is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} warp damage.

languages.text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}, если {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} больше или равно 15, все существа в 4 клетках от псайберворона получают {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each round, if the veil degradation is 15 or more, all creatures in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}relaying{/g} psyber-raven's area of effect suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} warp damage.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulması{/g} 15 veya daha fazlaysa ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar, {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Her raundun başlangıcında örtü bozulması 15 veya daha fazlaysa ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar, {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} öteboyut hasarına maruz kalır.

Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında örtü bozulması 15 veya daha fazlaysa ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar, {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} öteboyut hasarına maruz kalır.

languages.text: Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, si la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} es de 15 o más, todas las criaturas en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo sufren {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de cada asalto, si la degradación del velo es de 15 o más, todas las criaturas en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo sufren {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} de daño de disformidad.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，如果{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}恶化程度至少为15点，则距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有生物都会受到{uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253}点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每轮开始时，如果障壁恶化程度至少为15点，则距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有生物都会受到{uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253}点亚空间伤害。

languages.text: Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erleiden bei {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} von 15 oder mehr alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jeder Runde erleiden bei Zerfall des Schleiers von 15 oder mehr alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} Warp-Schaden.

languages.text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, si {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} est égal ou supérieur à 15, toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille subissent {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is 15 or more, all creatures in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven suffer {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chaque round, si Dégradation du Voile est égal ou supérieur à 15, toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille subissent {uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253} points de dégâts du Warp.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が15以上の場合、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セル以内の生物はすべて{uip|WarpDamage|397d0c905d074ac183684d5547868253}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を受ける。
